titles: An answere to a seditious pamphlet lately cast abroade by a Iesuite with a discouerie of that blasphemous sect. By William Charke.
author: Charke, William, d. 1617.
Francke, Christian, b. 1549. Colloquium Jesuiticum. English.
publisher: By Christopher Barker, printer to the Queenes most excellent Maiestie,
notes: In two parts: Charke's response to Edmund Campion's "Nine articles directed to the Lords of the Privy-Council" and a translation by Charke of Christian Francke's "Colloquium Jesuiticum" entitled "A conference or dialogue discovering the sect of Jesuites". Register is continuous.
At foot of title page: Decembris .17.
Part 2 identified on UMI microfilm reel 1306 as STC 11325.
Imperfect; as filmed: part 1 only on UMI microfilm reel 952 and part 2 only on UMI microfilm reel 1306.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (reel 952; part 1 only) and the Bodleian Library (reel 1306; part 2 only).
Appears at reel 952 (British Library copy) and reel 1306 (Bodleian Library copy).
keywords: Campion, Edmund, --  Saint, 1540-1581. --  Nine articles directed to the Lords of the Privy-Council.
